General.Name: Chipsea Technologies Shenzhen Corp Ltd
General.Description: Chipsea Technologies (shenzhen) Corp., a chip design company, focuses on the research and development of ADCs, MCUs, measurement algorithms, and one-stop solutions for the Internet of Things in China. Its products and solutions are used in industrial measurement and control, communication and computer, lithium battery management, consumer and automotive electronics, smart home, smart meters, smart health, etc. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Shenzhen Bay Innovation and Technology Center, Shenzhen, China, 518000

AddressData.Street: Shenzhen Bay Innovation and Technology Center
